item.title: Basic Stats U Need #4: Correlation & Regression
item.description: Correlation Correlation Demonstration! Deriving regression coefficients! Why normally distributed errors? Sampling distributions of coefficient estimates Confidence and Prediction intervals for a given X Whatâ€™s the relationship between correlation and regression? Multiple regression: multiple predictors Multiple \(R\) and \(R^2\) \(R^2\) in one bang using correlation matricies Semipartial and Partial Correlations Semipartial correlations: the residuals approach Increments to \(R^2\) when adding predictors Multicollinearity Regression assumptions Partial correlations: the residuals approach .
